title-group.article-title: Capital Budgeting for the Multinational Corporation

abstract.p: Capital budgeting for the multinational corporation presents many problems that rarely if ever exist in domestic capital budgeting. This paper examines such problems and suggests ways to cope with them by adjusting cash flows instead of the cost of capital.
